comments:
Error message when restoring default Typing Preferences.

After changing the Typing Pereferenes, and macking any changes with the editor.
Go back to Typing Pereferenes, and press on "Restore Default" button, and
apply.

you will get the error : Error notifying a preference change listener. Check
the log for details. 

The Typing Preferences, shows that everything is mark ok, but in fact nothing
workes.
